Author: xiaoyingdou
Text: thank you!! this reassured me a lot and I'll try to! I'll try to enjoy it as much as I can too!! <3

Author: kenodhagxjah
Text: as someone who was at a summer camp recently, ik you meant the last line jokingly but it's 100% true. I burned so much with just walking around and doing performances and stuff that i literally didn't have time to think about food. And the best thing is, you get food on like set times so you can't snack or eat whenever. It really is so convenient but please i encourage you too eat too. If you are gonna be active please remember that you'll be needing more food, just to keep you minimum energy.
